name: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Prince of Persia - Warrior Within/PrinceOfPersia.exe

files.install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Prince of Persia - Warrior Within/PrinceOfPersia.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing the Game
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC: 60
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.12
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
